title: Safe Landings
description: Two survivors of a plane crash, Elaine and Jessica, fall into an inescapable love affair with each other in the aftermath of their tragic experience. Through group therapy the two women reconnect and discover a secret bond between them that spirals into a passionate sexual relationship. Elaine is a married woman and Jessica was on the verge of getting engaged before the crash, but their emotional and lust-filled need for each other proves more powerful than the vows and promises made to their significant others. Their fated affair brings them to the edge of risking their relationships, and the two women must face a life-changing decision to stay together or part ways forever.Read the amazing review from Sylvia Storm here: http://ereaderotica.com/?p=6170Watch the SFW YouTube trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BDfao... Movie is out on DVD and VOD 9/30
author: Kay Brandt
